name: resolveTasks(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the tasks to delete.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:

                      with completion: @escaping ([INDeleteTasksTaskResolutionResult]) -> Void)
